com.google.api.client.json
Class JsonFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.google.api.client.json.JsonFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
GsonFactory, JacksonFactory
public abstract class JsonFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract low-level JSON factory.

Since:
1.3
Author:
Yaniv Inbar

Constructor Summary
JsonFactory()
           
 
Method Summary
abstract  JsonGenerator createJsonGenerator(java.io.OutputStream out, JsonEncoding enc)
          Returns a new instance of a low-level JSON serializer for the given output stream and encoding.
abstract  JsonGenerator createJsonGenerator(java.io.Writer writer)
          Returns a new instance of a low-level JSON serializer for the given writer.
abstract  JsonParser createJsonParser(java.io.InputStream in)
          Returns a new instance of a low-level JSON parser for the given input stream.
abstract  JsonParser createJsonParser(java.io.Reader reader)
          Returns a new instance of a low-level JSON parser for the given reader.
abstract  JsonParser createJsonParser(java.lang.String value)
          Returns a new instance of a low-level JSON parser for the given string value.
 java.lang.String toString(java.lang.Object item)
          Returns a serialized JSON string representation for the given item using JsonGenerator.serialize(Object) suitable for debugging in Object.toString().

toString

public final java.lang.String toString(java.lang.Object item)
Returns a serialized JSON string representation for the given item using JsonGenerator.serialize(Object) suitable for debugging in Object.toString().

Parameters:
